action.name: Pummel
action.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d6 - 1) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Oil Puddle
action.desc: The boggle creates a puddle of nonflammable oil. It has the choice of making the oil slippery or sticky, affecting creatures' movement and ability to stay upright.

bonus_action.name: Boggle Oil
bonus_action.desc: The boggle excretes nonflammable oil from its pores, giving itself benefits like escaping grapples or enhancing grappling capabilities.

bonus_action.name: Dimensional Rift
bonus_action.desc: The boggle creates an invisible and immobile rift within an opening or frame it can see within 5 feet of it. Only the boggle can use the rift, and it lasts until the end of the boggle's next turn.

1/8.name: Xvart Speaker
1/8.languages: Abyssal and one additional language (usually Common or Goblin)

special_abilities.name: Low Cunning
special_abilities.desc: The xvart can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

special_abilities.name: Overbearing Pack
special_abilities.desc: The xvart has advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks to shove a creature if at least one of the xvart's allies is within 5 feet of the target and the ally isn't incapacitated.

special_abilities.name: Raxivort's Tongue
special_abilities.desc: The xvart can communicate with ordinary bats and rats, as well as giant bats and giant rats.

action.name: Shortsword
action.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Sling
action.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Chameleon Skin
special_abilities.desc: The troglodyte has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

special_abilities.name: Stench
special_abilities.desc: Any creature other than a troglodyte that starts its turn within 5 feet of the troglodyte must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of all troglodytes for 1 hour.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: While in sunlight, the troglodyte has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
action.desc: The troglodyte makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
action.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

1/8.name: Hoard Scarab
1/8.senses: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 9

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: If the scarab is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the scarab move or act, that creature must succeed on a DC 18 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the scarab is animate.

action.name: Bite
action.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it has disadvantage on attack rolls until the start of its next turn.

bonus_action.name: Scale Dust
bonus_action.desc: The scarab releases magical glittering dust from its wings. Each creature within 5 feet of the scarab must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or be outlined in blue light for 10 minutes. While outlined, a creature sheds dim light in a 10-foot radius and can't benefit from being invisible. Moreover, every Dragon within 1 mile becomes aware of it and can unerringly track the creature. Casting dispel magic on the creature ends the effect on it.

special_abilities.name: Raxivort's Tongue
special_abilities.desc: The xvart can communicate with ordinary bats and rats, as well as giant bats and giant rats.

action.name: Shortsword
action.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage. If at least one of the xvart's allies is within 5 feet of the target, the xvart can push the target 5 feet if the target is a Medium or smaller creature.

action.name: Sling
action.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

bonus_action.name: Low Cunning
bonus_action.desc: The xvart takes the Disengage action.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: The rat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The rat has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the rat's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

action.name: Bite
action.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Hallucination Spores
action.desc: The bridesmaid ejects spores at one creature it can see within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. While poisoned in this way, the target is incapacitated. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Infestation Spores
action.desc: The bridesmaid releases spores that burst out in a cloud that fills a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on it, and the cloud lingers for 1 minute. Any flesh-and-blood creature in the cloud when it appears, or that enters it later, must make a DC 10 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is infected with a disease called the spores of Zuggtmoy and also gains a random form of indefinite madness.

special_abilities.name: Fungus Stride
special_abilities.desc: Once on its turn, the bridesmaid can use 10 feet of its movement to step magically into one living mushroom or fungus patch within 5 feet and emerge from another within 60 feet of the first one, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the second mushroom or fungus patch. The mushrooms and patches must be large or bigger.

1/4.name: Acolyte
action: Club: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit +2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 ({@dice 1d4}) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Echolocation
special_abilities.desc: The bat can't use its blindsight while deafened.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing
special_abilities.desc: The bat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

action.name: Bite
action.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

1/4.name: Skeleton
action: Shortsword: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit +4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 ({@dice 1d6+2}) piercing damage.
Shortbow: Ranged Weapon Attack: {@hit +4} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 ({@dice 1d6+2}) piercing damage.

1/4.name: Zombie
action: Slam: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit +3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 ({@dice 1d6+1}) bludgeoning damage.

1/2.name: Shadow
1/2.damage_resistances: acid, cold, fire, lightning, thunder; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
1/2.condition_immunities: exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained

special_abilities.name: Amorphous
special_abilities.desc: The shadow can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

special_abilities.name: Shadow Stealth
special_abilities.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the shadow can take the Hide action as a bonus action. Its stealth bonus is also improved to +6.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Weakness
special_abilities.desc: While in sunlight, the shadow has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

action.name: Strength Drain
action.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) necrotic damage, and the target's Strength score is reduced by 1d4. The target dies if this reduces its Strength to 0. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest. If a non-evil humanoid dies from this attack, a new shadow rises from the corpse 1d4 hours later.

special_abilities.name: Formation Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The soldier has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, frightened, grappled, or restrained while it is within 5 feet of at least one ally.

action.name: Multiattack
action.desc: The soldier makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Longsword
action.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Shortsword
action.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

1/2.name: Swarm of Rot Grubs
1/2.condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained

special_abilities.name: Swarm
special_abilities.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny maggot. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Bites
action.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. Hit: 7 (2d6) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned. At the end of each of the poisoned target's turns, the target takes 3 (1d6) poison damage. Whenever the poisoned target takes fire damage, the target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. If the poisoned target ends its turn with 0 hit points, it dies.

special_abilities.name: Mimicry
special_abilities.desc: The gazer can mimic simple sounds of speech it has heard, in any language. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 10 Wisdom (Insight) check.

action.name: Bite
action.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

action.name: Eye Rays
action.desc: The gazer shoots two of the following magical eye rays at random, choosing one or two targets it can see within 60 feet of it: 1. Dazing Ray, 2. Fear Ray, 3. Frost Ray, 4. Telekinetic Ray.

bonus_action.name: Aggressive
bonus_action.desc: The gazer moves up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

action.name: Bite
action.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Nightmare Breath
action.desc: The dragon exhales a cloud of spores in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 5 (1d10) psychic damage, and it is frightened of the dragon for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage with no additional effects. A frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc: The mage is a 4th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as its spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13; +5 to hit with spell attacks). The mage knows the following spells from the wizard's spell list: Cantrips (at will): light, mage hand, shocking grasp; 1st level (4 slots): charm person, magic missile; 2nd level (3 slots): hold person, misty step.

action.name: Quarterstaff
action.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d8 - 1) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Garrote
action.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target of the meazel's size or smaller. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 13 with disadvantage). Until the grapple ends, the target takes 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of the meazel's turns. The meazel can't make weapon attacks while grappling a creature in this way.

action.name: Shortsword
action.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) necrotic damage.

action.name: Shadow Teleport
action.desc: Recharge 5â€“6. The meazel, any equipment it is wearing or carrying, and any creature it is grappling teleport to an unoccupied space within 500 feet of it, provided that the starting space and the destination are in dim light or darkness. The destination must be a place the meazel has seen before, but it need not be within line of sight. If the destination space is occupied, the teleportation leads to the nearest unoccupied space. Any other creature the meazel teleports becomes cursed for 1 hour or until the curse is ended by remove curse or greater restoration. Until this curse ends, every Undead and every creature native to the Shadowfell within 300 feet of the cursed creature can sense it, which prevents that creature from hiding from them.

1.name: Tin Soldier
1.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

special_abilities.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
special_abilities.desc: The tin soldier is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the tin soldier must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While the tin soldier remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal suit of armor.

action.name: Multiattack
action.desc: The tin soldier makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Slam
action.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

2.name: Mimic
action: Pseudopod: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit +5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 ({@dice 1d8+3}) bludgeoning damage. If the mimic is in object form, the target is subjected to its Adhesive trait.
Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit +5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 ({@dice 1d8+3}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@dice 1d8}) acid damage.

3.name: Basilisk
action: Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit +5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 ({@dice 2d6+3}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@dice 2d6}) poison damage.

3.name: Minotaur
action: Greataxe: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit +6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 ({@dice 2d12+4}) slashing damage.
Gore: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit +6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 ({@dice 2d8+4}) piercing damage.

4.name: Lamia
action: Multiattack: The lamia makes two attacks: one with its claws and one with its dagger or Intoxicating Touch.
Claws: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit +5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 ({@dice 2d10+3}) slashing damage.
Dagger: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit +5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 ({@dice 1d4+3}) piercing damage.

Intoxicating Touch: Melee Spell Attack: {@hit +5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: The target is magically cursed for 1 hour. Until the curse ends, the target has disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws and all ability checks.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.description: The rat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

special_abilities.name: Echolocation
special_abilities.description: The bat can't use its blindsight while deafened.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing
special_abilities.description: The bat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.
